import React,{useContext} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { GlobleState } from '../../../../GlobleState' export default function Button({product}) { const state = useContext(GlobleState) const [isAdmin] = state.userApi.isAdmin return (
{isAdmin? <> delet edit : <> Buy View }
) }
